DOC.brief_summary: A prototype colonoscope with an extra passively bending distal section has been developed by Olympus Japan (ref. publications). The present study (2006-2007) is testing refinements of this function.
DOC.detailed_description: Results from the first prototype evaluation has been published.Modifications are presently evaluated.
DOC.criteria: Patients referred for routine outpatients colonoscopy Pregnant women Age below 18 years
